short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the Square Catcher Challenge – Catch blue squares while avoiding the red!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Square Catcher Challenge" is an exciting, fast-paced game that's perfect for casual gamers and those looking for a quick and fun challenge. Can you reach the top of the leaderboard and become the ultimate square-catching champion? There's only one way to find out – start playing now and catch those squares!

How to Play:

Use the left and right arrow keys on your keyboard to move the catcher.
Catch as many blue squares as possible to increase your score.
Avoid the red circles, as they'll end the game if caught.

Aim for the highest score and compete with friends to prove your square-catching skills.
